name: Friday
tagline: AI that calls you for self-reflection
description: Friday is a mental health app that helps user to build consistent reflection & journaling habits by a proactive AI voice call.

name: Amigo AI
tagline: AI-powered personal finance agent
description: Amigo AI Web (Beta) – your private AI-powered finance hub. Manage multiple accounts, budgets, goals, debts, assets & recurring expenses. Parse bank statements, track GST (for Indian users), and chat with smart finance tools.

name: TheBoringNotch
tagline: Open source Dynamic Island for your Mac's Notch
description: Boring Notch transforms your Mac’s notch into a smart mini‑dock: music controls with album art and visualizer, a file shelf with AirDrop, upcoming calendar events, quick mirror for camera checks, and battery/charging indicators that feels native to the Mac.

name: Flipt v2
tagline: Feature flags for safe deployments, git-native & self-hosted
description: Stop breaking production with risky deployments. Deploy features safely through an intuitive UI that automatically syncs to Git. All the safety, none of the complexity.

name: Send/Share Files by Couchdrop
tagline: Send encrypted file links instead of email attachments
description: Send files through temporary encrypted storage with expiring links. Built for teams handling sensitive data who need compliance (HIPAA, GDPR) without maintaining infrastructure. Integrates with your existing cloud storage.

name: Updog by Datadog
tagline: Don't Wait for Status Page Updates
description: Updog by Datadog lets you spot issues early, backed by real impact across Datadog customer base. Do not have to wait for any status page updates.

name: Picser
tagline: A native, powerful, elegant image viewer designed for macOS.
description: Picser is a powerful and elegant image viewer built exclusively for macOS. Developed with pure Swift/SwiftUI, it provides a seamless and native experience that fits perfectly into your workflow.

name: Keepsake
tagline: Collaboratively write and print stories
description: Write with loved ones, share memories in real time, and turn them into a professionally finished book to keep forever.

name: DeepShare
tagline: AI Chats to Word Documents
description: Export beautifully formatted Word documents from AI Chats on ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Gemini, Grok, and more with one click, copy formulas; support for DeepSeek conversation long screenshots.

name: Flowdrop
tagline: Cursor for workflows, automate anything with chat
description: Flowdrop is a no-code, AI-powered workflow builder that gets you automated in minutes. No API key management, no lengthy learning process, just chat, create and iterate.

name: uLuup
tagline: Mindful habits building for imperfect progress
description: i made uLuup for people who start things, stop, and then feel bad about it. it’s a simple habit app that forgives you when you miss a day. inspired by the idea of kintsugi, every time you return, your progress is repaired with gold.

name: Drynosaur
tagline: Make hangovers go extinct, one day at a time
description: Take a break from alcohol and evolve your Drynosaur. Check in daily, build streaks, and see real benefits as you progress through Eras. Perfect for Dry January, Sober October, or anyone cutting back.

name: PokeScope
tagline: Pokemon card price checker & recent eBay sales
description: Get instant Pokemon card prices & graded prices, track your collection, and make smarter trading decisions with PokeScope - the ultimate Pokemon TCG companion app.

name: Slowed Enchanced
tagline: Stupid Simple Audio Controls
description: Adjust video or audio playback speed, volume, and reverb with pitch preservation without paying a dime. ( Version 1.0 )

name: AI Cleaner by Lilucat
tagline: Free up space instantly with AI. Simple, fast, and private.
description: AI Cleaner selects photos, videos with the most defects, such as duplicates, blurriness, poor lighting, low resolution, or motion blur, for deletion. You can manually review and manage the selection at any time if you want to preserve certain shots.

name: RYPL
tagline: Turn Facebook ad comments into automated sales with AI
description: Human-like auto-replies, smart moderation & context-aware answers. Engage instantly, cut lead loss, boost sales ~10%, 24/7. 7-day free trial. Code PHOFF70: 70% off month 1.

name: FreeToolFor
tagline: Find free tools for any task instantly
description: FreeToolFor helps you instantly find and use 100+ free online tools for design, content, development, and productivity. No signup, no ads — just fast and simple tools like image converters, PDF utilities, and more New tools added every week

name: Sprout Video Downloader
tagline: Download Sprout Hosted or embedded videos from SproutVideo
description: Sprout Video is built with security as a top priority, making downloads exceptionally complex.

name: MediaBoost
tagline: Get featured on top media boosting AI visibility and trust.
description: Mediaboost publishes your brand across 480+ outlets like Yahoo Finance, MarketWatch, and Business Insider within 48h. Feature guaranteed or refunded! Feature on top trusted media & boost your AI visibility, SEO authority, and brand trust.

name: Global Business Toolkit
tagline: Free business tools & calculators
description: Access 382+ free business calculators, invoice generators & productivity tools for entrepreneurs. GST calculator India, ROI calculator, profit margin calculator, invoice generator & more. No registration, instant results, 100% free forever.
